Summary Note:
The RM first encountered Maja Beatrix Lechner on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Maja Beatrix Lechner is a seasoned professional with over 37 years of experience.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, she chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
Family Background: Maja Beatrix Lechner is currently widowed. She has 3 kids called Andrea, Maier and Beatrix.
Education Background:
Maja finished secondary school at Gymnasium Wasagasse in 1983.
Maja completed her university studies at Graz University of Technology in 1974.
Occupation History:
Maja Beatrix Lechner is a 61 year old retired Industry Leader from Austria. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Maja Beatrix Lechner launched her career as a Research Scientist at Baxter BioScience, where she gained valuable experience from 1988 to 1993.
She then transitioned to Boehringer Ingelheim RCV GmbH & Co KG as a Clinical Trials Manager, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 1993 to 1998.
At Novartis Austria GmbH, she worked as a Regulatory Affairs Director from 1999 to 2002, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Her next role was as a CEO at Sandoz International GmbH, where she applied her extensive experience to drive innovation from 2003 to 2004.
Maja Beatrix Lechner retired after holding the position of Industry Leader at Sandoz International GmbH from 2004 to 2024.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 1120000 EUR from her earnings at all companies.
She owns condo in Innsbruck, where she resides. It is worth 890000 EUR.

In addition to her primary residence, she owns house in Kitzb√ºhel worth 892000 EUR.

Moreover, she has invested in additional property in Steinbach am Attersee, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The condo is valued at 1060000 EUR.

She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: In summary, Maja has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
